name: cary-connects-web
description: A Web page for Downtown Cary Parking

scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && node server.js" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && nodemon server.js" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd backend && npm install" "cd client && npm install"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: concurrently "cd client && npm install" "cd backend && npm install"
